description:
Tanakamaru Mougan is a Special Class http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator] and the Branch Director of the http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG]`s 2nd Ward Branch Office. He acted as the captain of Squad 2 in the Owl Suppression Operation.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Tanakamaru Mougan
